privacy_policy.policy_text: nformation supplied on this form is confidential and accessible only by UMW's COVID-19 Monitoring and Tracing Coordinator and essential UMW communications personnel. The University also is required to share confirmed cases of COVID-19 with the VDH. Once you report a new case, you will likely be contacted by the VDH, which may initiate contact tracing. Both UMW and VDH are committed to confidentiality.
